title: Video: Artem Lobov, Jason Knight hype Bare Knuckle FC 9 rematch
text:
Gallery Bare Knuckle FC 9 press conference: Best photos view 9 images

While Artem Lobov’s victory over Paulie Malignaggi got more attention than any other fight in the history of Bare Knuckle FC, his win over Jason Knight is the one regarded as the promotion’s best fight.

Lobov and Knight threw down for five brutal rounds at BKFC 5 on April 7 in Biloxi, Miss., before Lobov earned a unanimous nod.

Now the duo are getting set to go at it again, as they’ll headline BKFC 9 on Nov. 16, back in Biloxi in an event which will be aired on pay-per-view

Tuesday, the duo were part of a press conference in which they talked about how things went the first time around, and what might happen the second time around.

Click on the video linked above in order to see the highlights from Knight and the man his fans call “The GOAT.”
description: Who do you think will take rematch of BKFC's best fight?
